editorialSummary.text: Showroom offering high-quality pianos including Steinway & W. Hoffmann, rentals & repairs.

originalText.text: Matt helped me pick out a wonderful Yamaha hybrid piano. He took time to answer all my questions and make an educated decision about what instrument was appropriate for me. He made the experience one I won‚Äôt forget.

text.text: Matt helped me pick out a wonderful Yamaha hybrid piano. He took time to answer all my questions and make an educated decision about what instrument was appropriate for me. He made the experience one I won‚Äôt forget.

originalText.text: I visited Faust Harrison in NYC while on a months long hunt for a special instrument. From the moment I walked in, Dmitri, made me feel right at home and took care in responding to all of my numerous questions. He also has mastered the art of giving space for someone to play and try many pianos, always being close to discuss or chat, and then step away as soon as he saw my attention move back to playing. It was the most relaxed I felt in any showroom and I truly noticed and appreciated it. I highly recommend Faust Harrison and Dmitri if you‚Äôre interested in finding an amazing piano that‚Äôs perfect for you.

originalText.text: Picking piano back up as an adult and Faust Harrison was helpful explaining the pros of each kind of piano. Worked with Matt at the NYC showroom, who was very helpful showing me CLP Yamahas. They were able to schedule a quick delivery, and despite a bump in the road with delivery, went above and beyond supporting me on my journey to learn piano. These are the pros to trust üëçüèª

originalText.text: This was a phenomenal experience. Words cannot describe the delivery/ quality of product experiences I had been having between furniture and appliances while setting up our rural home. Delivery communication and more broken furniture than functional.... I was really nervous about the thought of a broken piano. Renovations were complete and I was finally ready to find our new piano and I could not find the Yamaha Clavinova baby grand ANYWHERE. We order a lot of our music equipment from Sweetwater and they were among many that said that they had the piano, which did not end up being accurate. I took a total risk based on reviews and basically prayed as I submitted the order. We were contacted almost immediately by Pamela Smith regarding the delivery. I told her our very complicated schedule as I had been visiting from another state during renovations. She worked with me for months to coordinate the best timing. The day of the delivery, I saw our beautiful piano as it was unwrapped and set-up. Stunning. Not a dent or nic. Sound is incredible and radiates through our property. This was an experience above and beyond the typical.

originalText.text: My piano purchase was quick and efficient, they are really the best. Always professional, punctual and ready to help with anything piano related.
